miss_msg_u: The %1$s tries to stomp on you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: The %1$s tries stomp on <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s stomps on your %2$s, but your armor protects you.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s stomps on <npcname>, but their armor protects them.

hit_dmg_u: The %1$s swings its massive tail at your %2$s, pulverizing it!
hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s swings its massive tail at <npcname>'s %2$s!
no_dmg_msg_u: The %s swings its tail at you, but it's blunted by your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: The %s swings its tail at <npcname>, but they appear unharmed.
miss_msg_u: The %s swings its tail at you, but you dodge it!
miss_msg_npc: The %s swings its tail at <npcname>, who dodges it!
